q1: Do you think this team will qualify for the next World Cup?
a1: They have a shot but it will be tuff.
a2: Iceland doesn't have enough world class players to really make a dent.
q3: Could Iceland be good enough long term to maintain their position as a middle of the pack nation?
q4: Given that this was their first world cup, do you believe they can make it to the next?
a4: Iceland will make it but will not win.
